name: genomic-agent-design
description: Local tooling to render Mermaid diagrams and validate schemas.

scripts.render:svg: mkdir -p figures/svg && for f in $(ls figures/*.mmd); do npx -y @mermaid-js/mermaid-cli -i $f -o figures/svg/$(basename ${f%.mmd}).svg; done
scripts.render:png: mkdir -p figures/png && for f in $(ls figures/*.mmd); do npx -y @mermaid-js/mermaid-cli -i $f -o figures/png/$(basename ${f%.mmd}).png --scale 2; done
scripts.render:all: npm run render:svg && npm run render:png
scripts.lint:schema: node -e "console.log('Use your preferred JSON schema validator');"
